verses.name: 2 Kings 15:8
verses.text: In the thirty and eighth year of Azariah king of Judah did Zachariah the son of Jeroboam reign over Israel in Samaria six months.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:9
verses.text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, as his fathers had done: he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:10
verses.text: And Shallum the son of Jabesh conspired against him, and smote him before the people, and slew him, and reigned in his stead.
